alert.note: Alert for Ellsworth; McPherson; Rice; Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 8:27PM CDT until April 12 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern McPherson County in central Kansas... Northern Rice County in central Kansas... Southeastern Ellsworth County in central Kansas... Southwestern Saline County in central Kansas... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 827 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles east of Kanopolis to 6 miles southwest of Geneseo, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 to 70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Lyons, Kanopolis, Little River, Geneseo, Frederick, Kanopolis Lake and Kanopolis State Park. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
